Package oopds.assignment.DC.services

Class DonationRequestedService

java.lang.Object
oopds.assignment.DC.services.DonationRequestedService
All Implemented Interfaces:
DonationService<DonationRequested>
@Service public class DonationRequestedService extends Object implements DonationService<DonationRequested>
A Service Class to be used by the Spring API to do certain operations based on the method called. This service class contains the operations that involves the Donation Requested Entity.
